mapper.insert: insert into p_review(num, username, age, gender, idx, review_star, title, content, image_file) values((select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from p_review),#{username},#{age},#{gender},#{idx},#{review_star},#{title}, #{content},#{image_file})
mapper.select: select count(*) from p_review where username = #{userid}

select a.num, a.username, a.age, a.gender, a.idx, a.review_star, a.title, a.content, a.review_count, a.image_file, a.reg_date, b.iname, b.picture, b.volume from p_review a full outer join p_items b on (a.idx = b.idx) where a.username =#{userid} and (a.title like #{keyword} or a.content like #{keyword} or b.iname like #{keyword})
mapper.insert: insert into review_comment (comment_num,board_num,nickname,content) values ((select nvl(max(comment_num)+1,1) from review_comment) , #{board_num}, #{nickname}, #{content})
mapper.select: select a.num, a.username, a.age, a.gender, a.idx, a.review_star, a.title, a.content, a.review_count, a.image_file, a.reg_date, b.iname, b.picture, b.volume from p_review a full outer join p_items b on (a.idx = b.idx) where (a.title like #{keyword} or a.content like #{keyword} or b.iname like #{keyword})
